Introduction

Test:

Diagram

We highly recommend you to use UMLet under Eclipse environment.

Usage

1. Including

Add following line of code in script block. 
 W.control('A_Template');

2. Instantiate a control object

In either case, Wednus Platform will loadup the control, and now we can use the control like this: 
 var myTemp = new W.A_Template();

3. Using object

After the object creation, you can access public member properties and methods as below. 
 alert(myTemp.name);

Code Example

This example will print 'control name: A_Template', the name of this control. 
 <script type='text/javascript'>
 W.control('A_Template');
 </script>

 <script type='text/javascript'>
 var myTemp = new W.A_Template();
 document.write('control name: '+ myTemp.name);
 </script>

Test:
CodeExample.html
Warning:
Do not merge the two script blocks into one because the control should need to be fully loaded before any use.
